Name: Junkyard Fury 2
About the game: The killer cars are back, and they're everywhere! It's not just one junkyard this time. There's multiple locations that need to be shut down. You will have to prep for these areas, strategizing ways to neutralize the instances inside them. Only problem is that they're faster and smarter than before. Will you succeed? Features: - Enter multiple locations exploring vast areas and surviving through experiments. - Scavenge items and tools to aid your objectives inside the areas. - Investigate and discover anomalies to properly handle cases. - Drive and repair vehicles throughout areas to get around faster.
Meta Title: Junkyard Fury 2: Oct 27, 2022, Daniel Hood and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Junkyard Fury 2? Check out the release date (Oct 27, 2022), developer insights from Daniel Hood, and a complete game summary.
